skt: samo viśeṣa uta vāpi hīno yo manyate sa vivadeta tena vidhātraye ’smin na vikampate yaḥ samo viśiṣṭaś ca na tasya bhavati

pli: Acchecchi taṇhaṃ idha nāmarūpe; Taṃ chinnaganthaṃ anighaṃ nirāsaṃ, Pariyesamānā nājjhagamuṃ; Devā manussā idha vā huraṃ vā, Saggesu vā sabbanivesanesu.
skt: ācchidya tṛṣṇām iha nāmarūpe prahāya mānaṃ ca na saṃgam eti taṃ śāntadhūmam anighaṃ nirāśaṃ nādrākṣus te devamanuṣyaloke iha bāhirataś ca

pli: Kathaṃvihārībahulodha bhikkhu, Pañcoghatiṇṇo atarīdha chaṭṭhaṃ; Kathaṃ jhāyiṃ bahulaṃ kāmasaññā, Paribāhirā honti aladdha yo tan'ti.
skt: kathaṃvihārabahulo bhikṣuḥ pañcaughatīrṇas taratīha ṣaṣṭhaṃ kathaṃdhyāyī vipulāṃ kāmatṛṣṇāṃ tīrṇo bhavaty apratilabdhayoktraḥ

pli: Passaddhakāyo suvimuttacitto, Asaṅkharāno satimā anoko; Aññāya dhammaṃ avitakkajhāyī, Na kuppati na sarati na thino.
skt: praśrabdhakāyaḥ suvimuktacitto hy asaṃskurvan smṛtimān akopyaḥ ājñāya dharmam avitarkadhyāyī kopaspṛhāstyānadoṣaiḥ viyuktaḥ

pli: Evaṃvihārībahulodha bhikkhu, Pañcoghatiṇṇo atarīdha chaṭṭhaṃ; Evaṃ jhāyiṃ bahulaṃ kāmasaññā, Paribāhirā honti aladdha yo tan'ti.
skt: evaṃvihārabahulo bhikṣuḥ pañcaughatīrṇas taratīha ṣaṣṭhaṃ evaṃdhyāyī vipulāṃ kāmatṛṣṇāṃ tīrṇo bhavaty apratilabdhayoktraḥ

pli: Nāññatra bojjhā tapasā, nāññatrindriyasaṃvarā; Nāññatra sabbanissaggā, sotthiṃ passāmi pāṇinan”ti.
skt: nānyatra jñānatapaso nānyatrendriyanigrahāt nānyatra sarvasaṃtyāgān mokṣaṃ paśyāmi devate

pli: Cirassaṃ vata passāmi, brāhmaṇaṃ parinibbutaṃ; Appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ loke visattikan”ti.
skt: cirasya bata paśyāmi brāhmaṇaṃ parinirvṛtaṃ sarvavairabhayātītaṃ tīrṇaṃ loke viṣaktikām

pli: Yo sīlavā paññavā bhāvitatto, Samāhito jhānarato satīmā; Sabbassa sokā vigatā pahīnā, Khīṇāsavo antimadehadhārī.
skt: yaḥ śīlavāñ jñānavān bhāvitātmā samāhitaḥ smṛtimān ṛjugataś ca sarve ’sya śokajvarathāḥ prahīṇāḥ samyaksmṛto yasya cittaṃ vimuktaṃ

pli: Kathaṃsu kittiṃ pappoti, kathaṃ mittāni ganthati.
skt: kathaṃ kīrtim avāpnoti kathaṃ mitrāṇi vindati

pli: Saccena kittiṃ pappoti, dadaṃ mittāni ganthati.
skt: satyena kīrtim āpnoti dadan mitrāṇi vindati

pli: Kuto sarā nivattanti, kattha vaṭṭaṃ na vattati; Kattha nāmañca rūpañca, asesaṃ uparujjhatī'ti.
skt: kutaḥ sarā nivartante kutra vartma na vartate kutra duḥkhasukhaṃ loke niḥśeṣam uparudhyate

pli: Sokāvatiṇṇo nu vanamhi jhāyasi, Vittaṃ nu jīno uda patthayāno; Āguṃ nu gāmasmimakāsi kiñci, Kasmā janena na karosi sakkhiṃ; Sakkhī na sampajjati kenaci te”ti.
skt: eko ’raṇye prasṛto dhyāyase tvaṃ vittād vihīna uta vā prārthayānaḥ grāmasya vā kiṃcanāgo nv akārṣīḥ kasmāj janena na karoṣi sakhyaṃ sakhyaṃ na saṃvidyate kena cit tava

pli: Atthassa pattiṃ hadayassa santiṃ, Jetvāna senaṃ piyasātarūpaṃ; Ekohaṃ jhāyaṃ sukhamanubodhiṃ, Tasmā janena na karomi sakkhiṃ; Sakkhī na sampajjati kenaci me”ti.
skt: arthāprāptyā hṛdayasyeha śāntir jitveha senāṃ priyaśātarūpaṃ eko dhyāyī sukham asmy anvabhotsaṃ tasmād janena na karomi sakhyaṃ sakhyaṃ na saṃvidyate kena cid mama

pli: Ye ca rūpe pamāṇiṃsu, ye ca ghosena anvagū; Chandarāgavasūpetā, nābhijānanti te janā.
skt: ye rūpeṇa pramiṇvanti māṃ ghoṣeṇānuyānti ca cchandarāgavaśopetā na mā jānanti te janāḥ

pli: Ajjhattañca na jānāti, bahiddhā ca vipassati; Bahiddhā phaladassāvī, sopi ghosena vuyhati.
skt: adhyātmaṃ ca vijānāti bahirdhā ca na paśyati adhyātmaphaladarśī yaḥ sa vai ghoṣeṇa nīyate

pli: Ajjhattañca na jānāti, bahiddhā ca na passati; Samantāvaraṇo bālo, sa ve ghosena vuyhati.
skt: adhyātmaṃ ca na jānāti bahirdhā ca na paśyati samantāvaraṇo bālaḥ so ’pi ghoṣeṇa nīyate

pli: Ajjhattañca pajānāti, bahiddhā ca vipassati; Vinīvaraṇadassāvī, na so ghosena vuyhatī”ti.
skt: adhyātmaṃ ca vijānāti bahirdhā ca vipaśyati dhīro niḥsaraṇaprajño na sa ghoṣeṇa nīyate

pli: Dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati, Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyati; Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakaṃ, Rāgadosamohakkhayā sanibbuto”ti
skt: dadataḥ puṇyaṃ pravardhate vairaṃ saṃyamato na cīyate kuśalī prajahāti pāpakaṃ kleśānāṃ kṣayatas tu nirvṛtaḥ

pli: Tassa ce kāmayānassa, chandajātassa jantuno; Te kāmā parihāyanti, sallaviddhova ruppati.
skt: tasya cet kāmāyamānasya chandajātasya jaṃtunaḥ te kāmāḥ parihīyaṃte śalyaviddha iva rūpyate

pli: Yo kāme parivajjeti, sappasseva padā siro; Somaṃ visattikaṃ loke, sato samativattati.
skt: yaḥ kāmāṃ parivarjayati sarpasyeva śirāt padaṃ sa imāṃ viṣaktikāṃ loke smṛtaḥ samativartate

pli: Khettaṃ vatthuṃ hiraññaṃ vā, gavāssaṃ dāsaporisaṃ; Thiyo bandhū puthu kāme, yo naro anugijjhati.
skt: kṣetravastuhiraṇyaṃ ca gavāśvamaṇikuṇḍalaṃ striyo dāsān pṛthakkāmān yo naro hy abhigṛdhyati

pli: Abalā naṃ balīyanti, maddantenaṃ parissayā; Tato naṃ dukkhamanveti, nāvaṃ bhinnamivodakaṃ.
skt: abalaṃ vā balīyāṃso mṛdnaṃty enaṃ parisravāḥ tata enaṃ duḥkham anveti bhinnāṃ nāvam ivodakaṃ

pli: Kāmaṃ kāmayamānassa, tassa ce taṃ samijjhati; Addhā pītimano hoti, laddhā macco yadicchati.
skt: kāmān kāmāyamānasya tasya cet tat samṛdhyati addhā prītamanā bhavati labdhvā martyo yad īpsitaṃ

pli: Atītaṃ nānvāgameyya, nappaṭikaṅkhe anāgataṃ; Paccuppannañca yo dhammaṃ, Tattha tattha vipassati; Asaṃhīraṃ asaṃkuppaṃ, Taṃ vidvā manubrūhaye.
skt: atītaṃ nānvāgamayen na pratikāṃkṣed anāgataṃ pratyutpannāś ca ye dharmās tatra tatra vipaśyakaḥ asaṃhāryam asaṃkṣobhyaṃ tad vidvān anubṛṃhayet

pli: Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppanno vā kāmacchando uppajjati uppanno vā kāmacchando bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, subhanimittaṃ. Subhanimittaṃ, bhikkhave, ayoniso manasi karoto anuppanno ceva kāmacchando uppajjati uppanno ca kāmacchando bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattatī”ti.
skt: nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yenānutpannaṃ ca kāmacchandanivaraṇam utpadyate utpannaṃ ca bhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatāṃ gacchati yathā aśubhayā anāsevitayā abhāvitayā abahulīkṛtayā | aśubhayā anāsevitayā abhāvitayā abahulīkṛtayā anutpannaṃ ca kāmacchandanivaraṇam utpadyate utpannaṃ ca bhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatāṃ gacchati

pli: Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppanno vā byāpādo uppajjati uppanno vā byāpādo bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭighanimittaṃ. Paṭighanimittaṃ, bhikkhave, ayoniso manasi karoto anuppanno ceva byāpādo uppajjati uppanno ca byāpādo bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattatī”ti.
skt: nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yenānutpannaṃ ca vyāpādanivaraṇam utpadyate utpannaṃ ca bhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatāṃ gacchati yathā maitryā anāsevitayā abhāvitayā abahulīkṛtayā | maitryā anāsevitayā abhāvitayā abahulīkṛtayā anutpannaṃ ca vāpādanivaraṇam utpadyate utpannaṃ ca bhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatāṃ gacchati

pli: Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannaṃ vā thinamiddhaṃ uppajjati uppannaṃ vā thinamiddhaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, arati tandī vijambhitā bhattasammado cetaso ca līnattaṃ. Līnacittassa, bhikkhave, anuppannañceva thinamiddhaṃ uppajjati uppannañca thinamiddhaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattatī”ti.
skt: nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yenānutpannaṃ ca styānamiddhanivaraṇam utpadyate utpannaṃ ca bhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatāṃ gacchati yathā anāsevitayā abhāvitayā abahulīkṛtayā | anāsevitayā abhāvitayā abahulīkṛtayā anutpannaṃ ca styānamiddhanivaraṇam utpadyate utpannaṃ ca bhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatāṃ gacchati

pli: Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannaṃ vā uddhaccakukkuccaṃ uppajjati uppannaṃ vā uddhaccakukkuccaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cetaso avūpasamo. Avūpasantacittassa, bhikkhave, anuppannañceva uddhaccakukkuccaṃ uppajjati uppannañca uddhaccakukkuccaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattatī”ti.
skt: nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yenānutpannaṃ ca auddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇam utpadyate utpannaṃ ca bhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatāṃ gacchati yathā śamathena | śamathena anāsevitena abhāvitena abahulīkṛtena | anutpannaṃ ca styānamiddhanivaraṇam utpadyate utpannaṃ ca bhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatāṃ gacchati

pli: Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannā vā vicikicchā uppajjati uppannā vā vicikicchā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, ayonisomanasikāro. Ayoniso, bhikkhave, manasi karoto anuppannā ceva vicikicchā uppajjati uppannā ca vicikicchā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattatī”ti.
skt: nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yenānutpannaṃ ca vicikitsānivaraṇam utpadyate utpannaṃ ca bhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatāṃ gacchati yathā idaṃpratyayatāpratītyasamutpādaparīkṣayā anāsevitayā abhāvitayā abahulīkṛtayā | idaṃpratyayatāpratītyasamutpādaparīkṣayā anāsevitayā abhāvitayā abahulīkṛtayā anutpannaṃ ca vicikitsānivaraṇam utpadyate utpannaṃ ca bhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatāṃ gacchati

pli: Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppanno vā kāmacchando nuppajjati uppanno vā kāmacchando pahīyati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, asubhanimittaṃ. Asubhanimittaṃ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karoto anuppanno ceva kāmacchando nuppajjati uppanno ca kāmacchando pahīyatī”ti.
skt: nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yenānutpannaṃ ca kāmacchandanivaraṇam notpadyate utpannaṃ ca prahīyate yathā śubhayā āsevitayā bhāvitayā bahulīkṛtayā | śubhayā āsevitayā bhāvitayā bahulīkṛtayā kāmacchandanivaraṇam notpadyate utpannaṃ ca prahīyate

pli: Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppanno vā byāpādo nuppajjati uppanno vā byāpādo pahīyati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, mettā cetovimutti. Mettaṃ, bhikkhave, cetovimuttiṃ yoniso manasi karoto anuppanno ceva byāpādo nuppajjati uppanno ca byāpādo pahīyatī”ti.
skt: nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yenānutpannaṃ ca vyāpādanivaraṇam notpadyate utpannaṃ ca prahīyate yathā maitryā āsevitayā bhāvitayā bahulīkṛtayā | maitryā āsevitayā bhāvitayā bahulīkṛtayā vyāpādanivaraṇam notpadyate utpannaṃ ca prahīyate

pli: Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannaṃ vā thinamiddhaṃ nuppajjati uppannaṃ vā thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, ārambhadhātu nikkamadhātu parakkamadhātu. Āraddhavīriyassa, bhikkhave, anuppannañceva thinamiddhaṃ nuppajjati uppannañca thinamiddhaṃ pahīyatī”ti.
skt: nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yenānutpannaṃ ca styānamiddhanivaraṇam notpadyate utpannaṃ ca prahīyate yathā āsevitayā bhāvitayā bahulīkṛtayā | āsevitayā bhāvitayā bahulīkṛtayā styānamiddhanivaraṇam notpadyate utpannaṃ ca prahīyate

pli: Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannaṃ vā uddhaccakukkuccaṃ nuppajjati uppannaṃ vā uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cetaso vūpasamo. Vūpasantacittassa, bhikkhave, anuppannañceva uddhaccakukkuccaṃ nuppajjati uppannañca uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyatī”ti.
skt: nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yenānutpannaṃ ca auddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇam notpadyate utpannaṃ ca prahīyate yathā śamathena āsevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena | śamathena āsevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena auddhatyakaukṛtyanivaraṇam notpadyate utpannaṃ ca prahīyate

pli: Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannā vā vicikicchā nuppajjati uppannā vā vicikicchā pahīyati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, yonisomanasikāro. Yoniso, bhikkhave, manasi karoto anuppannā ceva vicikicchā nuppajjati uppannā ca vicikicchā pahīyatī”ti.
skt: nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yenānutpannaṃ ca vicikitsānivaraṇam notpadyate utpannaṃ ca prahīyate yathā idaṃpratyayatāpratītyasamutpādaparīkṣayā āsevitayā bhāvitayā bahulīkṛtayā | idaṃpratyayatāpratītyasamutpādaparīkṣayā āsevitayā bhāvitayā bahulīkṛtayā vicikitsānivaraṇam notpadyate utpannaṃ ca prahīyate

pli: Nāhaṃ aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ abhāvitaṃ akammaniyaṃ hoti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ. Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, abhāvitaṃ akammaniyaṃ hotī”ti.
skt: nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evam abhāvitam amṛdu bhavati akarmaṇyaṃ yathedaṃ cittam | cittaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ abhāvitam amṛdu bhavati akarmaṇyam

pli: Taṃ kissa hetu?
skt: tat kasya hetor |

pli: Micchādiṭṭhikassa, purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi yañca vacīkammaṃ yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya akantāya amanāpāya ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Diṭṭhi hissa, bhikkhave, pāpikā.
skt: mithyādṛṣṭeḥ puruṣapudgalasya yac ca kāyakarma tathādṛṣṭeḥ yad vākkarma yā cetanā yā prārthanā yaḥ praṇidhir ye ca saṃskārās tanmayāḥ sarve ’sya te dharmā aniṣṭatvāya saṃvartante akāntatvāya apriyatvāya amanāpatvāya amanojñatvāya anabhipretatvāya saṃvartante | tat kasya hetor | dṛṣṭir hi pāpikā yaduta mithyādṛṣṭiḥ |

pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, nimbabījaṃ vā kosātakibījaṃ vā tittakālābubījaṃ vā allāya pathaviyā nikkhittaṃ yañceva pathavirasaṃ upādiyati yañca āporasaṃ upādiyati sabbaṃ taṃ tittakattāya kaṭukattāya asātattāya saṃvattati. Taṃ kissa hetu? Bījañhissa, bhikkhave, pāpakaṃ.
skt: tadyathā bhikṣavas tiktāny alābubījāni vā nimbabījāni vā kāśātakībījāni vā sukṣetre ropitāni syuḥ susnigdhe vā pṛthivīpradeśe upanikṣiptāni tāni yaṃ yam eva pṛthivyāḥ pṛthivīrasam ādadate adbhya abrasaṃ tejasas tejorasaṃ vāyor vāyurasaṃ sarve ’sya te rasās tiktatvāya saṃvartante kaṭukatvāya asvādutvāya | tat kasya hetor | bījāni hi tiktāni kaṭūny asvādūni |

pli: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, micchādiṭṭhikassa purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi yañca vacīkammaṃ yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya akantāya amanāpāya ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Diṭṭhi hissa, bhikkhave, pāpikā”ti.
skt: evam eva mithyādṛṣṭir bhikṣavaḥ param avadyānāṃ | mithyādṛṣṭeḥ puruṣapudgalasya yac ca kāyakarma tathādṛṣṭeḥ yad vākkarma yā cetanā yā prārthanā yaḥ praṇidhir ye ca saṃskārās tanmayāḥ sarve ’sya te dharmā aniṣṭatvāya saṃvartante akāntatvāya apriyatvāya amanāpatvāya amanojñatvāya anabhipretatvāya saṃvartante | tat kasya hetor | dṛṣṭir hi bhikṣavaḥ pāpikā yaduta mithyādṛṣṭiḥ |

pli: Sammādiṭṭhikassa, purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṃ samādinnaṃ yañca vacīkammaṃ yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā sabbe te dhammā iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Diṭṭhi hissa, bhikkhave, bhaddikā.
skt: samyagdṛṣṭeḥ puruṣapudgalasya yac ca kāyakarma tathādṛṣṭeḥ yad vākkarma yā cetanā yā prārthanā yaḥ praṇidhir ye ca saṃskārās tanmayāḥ sarve ’sya te dharmā iṣṭatvāya saṃvartante kāntatvāya priyatvāya manāpatvāya manojñatvāya abhipretatvāya saṃvartante | tat kasya hetor | dṛṣṭir hi bhikṣavo bhadrikā yaduta samyagdṛṣṭiḥ |

pli: Seyyathāpi, ucchubījaṃ vā sālibījaṃ vā muddikābījaṃ vā allāya pathaviyā nikkhittaṃ yañceva pathavirasaṃ upādiyati yañca āporasaṃ upādiyati sabbaṃ taṃ madhurattāya sātattāya asecanakattāya saṃvattati. Taṃ kissa hetu? Bījaṃ hissa, bhikkhave, bhaddakaṃ.
skt: tadyathā ikṣubījāni vā śālibījāni vā mṛdvikābjāni vā sukṣetre ropitāni syuḥ susnigdhe vā pṛthivīpradeśe upanikṣiptāni tāni yaṃ yam eva pṛthivyāḥ pṛthivīrasam ādadate adbhyaḥ abrasaṃ tejasas tejorasaṃ vāyor vāyurasaṃ sarve ’sya te rasā atiktatvāya saṃvartante akaṭukatvāya svādutvāya | tat kasya hetor | bījāni hi atiktāny akaṭūni svādūni |

pli: Evamevaṃ kho, sammādiṭṭhikassa purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṃ yathādiṭṭhi yañca vacīkammaṃ yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā sabbe te dhammā iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Diṭṭhi hissa, bhikkhave, bhaddikā”ti.
skt: evam eva samyagdṛṣṭeḥ puruṣapudgalasya yac ca kāyakarma tathādṛṣṭeḥ yad vākkarma yā cetanā yā prārthanā yaḥ praṇidhir ye ca saṃskārās tanmayāḥ sarve ’sya te dharmā iṣṭatvāya saṃvartante kāntatvāya priyatvāya manāpatvāya manojñatvāya abhipretatvāya saṃvartante | tat kasya hetor | dṛṣṭir hi bhikṣavo bhadrikā yaduta samyagdṛṣṭiḥ |

pli: Durakkhāte, dhammavinaye yo ca samādapeti yañca samādapeti yo ca samādapito tathattāya paṭipajjati sabbe te bahuṃ apuññaṃ pasavanti.
skt: durākhyāte dharmavinaya yaś ca samādāpayati yaś ca samādāpyate yaś ca samādāpitas tathatāṃ pratipadyate sarve te bahuśaḥ pāpaṃ prasavanti |

pli: Svākkhāte, dhammavinaye yo ca samādapeti yañca samādapeti yo ca samādapito tathattāya paṭipajjati sabbe te bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti.
skt: svākhyāte dharmavinaye yaś ca samādāpayati yaś ca samādāpyate yaś ca samādāpitas tathatāṃ pratipadyate sarve te bahuśaḥ puṇyaṃ prasavanti ||

pli: Durakkhāte, dhammavinaye yo āraddhavīriyo so dukkhaṃ viharati. Svākkhāte, dhammavinaye yo kusīto so dukkhaṃ viharati. Durakkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo kusīto so sukhaṃ viharati. Svākkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo āraddhavīriyo so sukhaṃ viharati.
skt: durākhyāte dharmavinaye yathāyathā ārabdhavīryas tathātathā pāpaṃ | svākhyāte dharmavinaye yathāyathā kusīdas tathātathā pāpaṃ | durākhyāte dharmavinaye yathāyathā kusīdas tathātathā śreyaḥ | svākhyāte dharmavinaye yathāyathā ārabdhavīryas tathātathā śreyaḥ ||

pli: Nāhaṃ, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ adantaṃ aguttaṃ arakkhitaṃ asaṃvutaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ cittaṃ. Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, adantaṃ aguttaṃ arakkhitaṃ asaṃvutaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
skt: nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evam adāntam aguptam arakṣitam asaṃvṛtam abhāvitam āyatyāṃ duḥkhavipākaṃ bhavati yathedaṃ cittam | cittaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ adāntam aguptam arakṣitam asaṃvṛtam abhāvitam āyatyāṃ duḥkhavipākaṃ bhavati |

pli: Nāhaṃ, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ rakkhitaṃ saṃvutaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ. Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, dantaṃ guttaṃ rakkhitaṃ saṃvutaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
skt: nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evam sudāntaṃ suguptaṃ surakṣitaṃ susaṃvṛtaṃ subhāvitam āyatyāṃ sukhavipākaṃ bhavati yathedaṃ cittam | cittaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ sudāntaṃ suguptaṃ surakṣitaṃ susaṃvṛtaṃ subhāvitam āyatyāṃ sukhavipākaṃ bhavati |

pli: Seyyathāpi, sālisūkaṃ vā yavasūkaṃ vā micchāpaṇihitaṃ hatthena vā pādena vā akkantaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā bhecchati lohitaṃ vā uppādessatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Taṃ kissa hetu? Micchāpaṇihitattā, sūkassa. Evamevaṃ kho, so vata bhikkhu micchāpaṇihitena cittena avijjaṃ bhecchati, vijjaṃ uppādessati, nibbānaṃ sacchikarissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Taṃ kissa hetu? Micchāpaṇihitattā, cittassā”ti.
skt: tadyathā śāliśūko vā yavaśūko vā mithyāduṣpraṇihitaḥ syāt | taṃ śūkaṃ strī vā puruṣo vā sukumāraḥ sukhaiṣī padbhyām anvākrameta | sa tasya abhavyas tvacaṃ bhitvā rudhiram utpādayituṃ | tat kasya hetor | mithyāduṣpraṇihitatvāc chūkasya | evam eva sa bata mithyāduṣpraṇihitena cittena ātmārthaṃ vā jñāsyati parārthaṃ vā ubhayārthaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā manuṣyadharmam alamāryaviśeṣādhigamaṃ jñānaṃ vā darśanaṃ vā sparśavihāratāṃ vā jñāsyati vā drakṣyati vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate | tat kasya hetor | mithyāduṣpraṇihitatvāc cittasya |

pli: Seyyathāpi, sālisūkaṃ vā yavasūkaṃ vā sammāpaṇihitaṃ hatthena vā pādena vā akkantaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā bhecchati lohitaṃ vā uppādessatīti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati. Taṃ kissa hetu? Sammāpaṇihitattā, sūkassa. Evamevaṃ kho, so vata bhikkhu sammāpaṇihitena cittena avijjaṃ bhecchati, vijjaṃ uppādessati, nibbānaṃ sacchikarissatīti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati. Taṃ kissa hetu? Sammāpaṇihitattā, cittassā”ti.
skt: tadyathā śāliśūko vā yavaśūko vā samyaksupraṇihitaḥ syāt | taṃ śūkaṃ strī vā puruṣo vā sukumāraḥ sukhaiṣī padbhyām anvākrameta | sa tasya bhavyas tvacaṃ bhitvā rudhiram utpādayituṃ | tat kasya hetoḥ | samyaksupraṇihitatvāc chūkasya | evam eva sa bata samyaksupraṇihitena cittena ātmārthaṃ vā jñāsyati parārthaṃ vā ubhayārthaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā manuṣyadharmam alamāryaviśeṣādhigamaṃ jñānaṃ vā darśanaṃ vā jñāsyati vā drakṣyati vā sthānam etad vidyate | tat kasya hetor | ṛju samyaksupraṇihitatvāc cittasya |

pli: nāññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ mudu ca hoti kammaññañca yathayidaṃ cittaṃ. Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ mudu ca hoti kammaññañca hotī”ti.
skt: nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yad evaṃ subhāvitaṃ mṛdu bhavati karmaṇyaṃ yathedaṃ cittaṃ | cittaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ subhāvitaṃ mṛdu bhavati karmaṇyam |

pli: Nāhaṃ, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yena anuppannā vā kusalā dhammā uppajjanti uppannā vā akusalā dhammā parihāyanti yathayidaṃ, kalyāṇamittatā. Kalyāṇamittassa, bhikkhave, anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjanti uppannā ca akusalā dhammā parihāyantī”ti.
skt: nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yena anutpannāś ca pāpakā akuśalā dharmā notpadyante utpannāś ca prahīyante anutpannāḥ kuśalā dharmā utpadyante utpannāś ca bhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatāṃ gacchanti yathā kalyāṇamitratayā kalyāṇasahāyatayā kalyāṇasaṃparkatayā | kalyāṇamitrasya hi bhikṣor viharataḥ kalyāṇasahāyasya kalyāṇasaṃparkasya anutpannāś ca pāpakā akuśalā dharmā notpadyante utpannāś ca prahīyante anutpannāḥ kuśalā dharmā utpadyante utpannāś ca bhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatāṃ gacchanti ||

pli: Dvemā, vassūpanāyikā. Purimikā ca pacchimikā ca.
skt: dve varṣopanāyike | pūrvikā ca paścimikā ca || ||

pli: Dveme, paccayā sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāya. Parato ca ghoso, yoniso ca manasikāro.
skt: dve hetū dvau pratyayau samyagdṛṣṭer utpādāya | parataś ca ghoṣa adhyātmaṃ ca yoniśo manasikāraḥ ||

pli: Dveme, bālā. Yo ca accayaṃ accayato na passati, yo ca accayaṃ desentassa yathādhammaṃ nappaṭiggaṇhāti. Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve bālāti.
skt: dvau balau / yaś cātyayam atyayato na jānāti / yaś cātyayam atyayato jñātvā na yathādharmaṃ pratikaroti //

pli: Uttānā ca parisā gambhīrā ca parisā. Katamā ca uttānā parisā? Idha, yassaṃ parisāyaṃ bhikkhū uddhatā honti unnaḷā capalā mukharā vikiṇṇavācā muṭṭhassatī asampajānā asamāhitā vibbhantacittā pākatindriyā. Ayaṃ vuccati, uttānā parisā.
skt: uttānāṃ ca vaḥ parṣadaṃ deśayiṣyāmi gaṃbhīrāṃ ca | uttānā parṣat katamā | yeyaṃ parṣat uddhatā unnatā capalā mukharā pragalbhā gharṣitasmṛtir asamāhitā ||| | iyam ucyate uttānā parṣat |

pli: Katamā ca gambhīrā parisā? Idha, yassaṃ parisāyaṃ bhikkhū anuddhatā honti anunnaḷā acapalā amukharā avikiṇṇavācā upaṭṭhitassatī sampajānā samāhitā ekaggacittā saṃvutindriyā. Ayaṃ vuccati gambhīrā parisā. Imā kho, dve parisā. Etadaggaṃ, imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ parisānaṃ yadidaṃ gambhīrā parisā”ti.
skt: gaṃbhīrā parṣat katamā | yeyaṃ parṣad anuddhatā anunnatā acapalā amukharā apragalbhā upasthitasmṛtiḥ samāhitā ||| | iyam ucyate gaṃbhīrā parṣat | uttānāṃ ca vaḥ parṣadaṃ deśayiṣyāmi gaṃbhīrāṃ ceti me yad uktam idaṃ me tat pratyuktam ||

pli: Vaggā ca parisā samaggā ca parisā. Katamā ca, vaggā parisā? Idha, yassaṃ parisāyaṃ bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṃ mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharanti. Ayaṃ vuccati vaggā parisā.
skt: vyagrāṃ ca vaḥ parṣadaṃ deśayiṣyāmi samagrāṃ ca | vyagrā parṣat katamā | yeyaṃ parṣat kalahajātā viharati bhaṇḍanajātā vigṛhitā vivādamāpannā | iyam ucyate vyagrā parṣat |

pli: Anaggavatī ca parisā aggavatī ca parisā. Katamā ca, anaggavatī parisā? Idha, yassaṃ parisāyaṃ therā bhikkhū bāhulikā honti sāthalikā, okkamane pubbaṅgamā, paviveke nikkhittadhurā, na vīriyaṃ ārabhanti appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya. Ayaṃ vuccati, anaggavatī parisā.
skt: anagravatīṃ ca vaḥ parṣadaṃ deśayiṣyāmi agravatīṃ ca | anagravatī parṣat katamā | yasyāṃ parṣadi navakā bhikṣavaḥ sthavireṣu bhikṣuṣu agauravā viharanty apratīśā abhayavaśavartinaḥ sthavirāś ca bhikṣavaḥ śaithilikā bhavanti bāhulikā avakramaṇīye pūrvaṃgamāḥ praviveke nikṣiptadhurāḥ śikṣāyāṃ mandagauravāḥ | iyam ucyate anagravatī parṣat |

pli: Katamā ca aggavatī parisā? Idha, yassaṃ parisāyaṃ therā bhikkhū na bāhulikā honti na sāthalikā, okkamane nikkhittadhurā, paviveke pubbaṅgamā, vīriyaṃ ārabhanti appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya. Tesaṃ pacchimā janatā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjati. Ayaṃ vuccati aggavatī parisā.
skt: agravatī parṣat katamā | yasyāṃ parṣadi navakā bhikṣavaḥ sthavireṣu bhikṣuṣu sagauravā viharanti sapratīśāḥ sabhayavaśavartinaḥ sthavirāś ca bhikṣavaḥ na śaithilikā bhavanti abāhulikāḥ avakramaṇīye nikṣiptadhurāḥ praviveke pūrvaṃgamāḥ śikṣāyāṃ tīvragauravāḥ | iyam ucyate agravatī parṣat |

pli: Anariyā ca parisā ariyā ca parisā. Katamā ca anariyā parisā? Idha yassaṃ parisāyaṃ bhikkhū ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodho’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti. Ayaṃ vuccati, anariyā parisā.
skt: anāryāṃ ca vaḥ parṣadaṃ deśayiṣyāmi āryāṃ ca | anāryā parṣat katamā | yeyaṃ parṣad idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ na prajānāty ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayo ’yaṃ duḥkhanirodha iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ na prajānāti | iyam ucyate anāryā parṣat |

pli: Katamā ca ariyā parisā? Idha, yassaṃ parisāyaṃ bhikkhū ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānanti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānanti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodho’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānanti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānanti. Ayaṃ vuccati ariyā parisā.
skt: āryā parṣat katamā | yeyaṃ parṣad idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāty ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayo ’yaṃ duḥkhanirodha iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | iyam ucyate āryā parṣat |

pli: Parisākasaṭo ca parisāmaṇḍo ca. Katamo ca parisākasaṭo? Ayaṃ vuccati, parisākasaṭo.
skt: parṣat kaṣāyaṃ ca vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi parṣanmaṇḍaṃ ca | parṣatkaṣāyaḥ katamaḥ | ayam ucyate parṣat kaṣāyaḥ |

pli: Katamo ca parisāmaṇḍo? Ayaṃ vuccati, parisāmaṇḍo.
skt: parṣanmaṇḍaḥ katamaḥ | ayam ucyate parṣanmaṇḍaḥ |

pli: Visamā ca parisā samā ca parisā. Katamā ca visamā parisā? Ayaṃ vuccati visamā parisā.
skt: viṣamāṃ ca vaḥ parṣadaṃ deśayiṣyāmi samāṃ ca | viṣamā parṣat katamā | iyam ucyate viṣamā parṣat |

pli: Katamā ca, samā parisā? Ayaṃ vuccati, samā parisā.
skt: samā parṣat katamā | iyam ucyate samā parṣat |

pli: Dveme, atthavase sampassamānā kiṃpurisā mānusiṃ vācaṃ na bhāsanti. Mā ca musā bhaṇimhā, mā ca paraṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhimhāti.
skt: dvāv arthavaśau saṃpaśyan kiṃpuruṣaḥ kiṃpuruṣīṃ vācaṃ na bhāṣate | mā ca mṛṣāvādaṃ kariṣyāmi mā ca pareṣām asatāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyam utpādayiṣyāmi |

pli: Catasso imā, bhikkhave, paṭipadā.
skt: Tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamāś-catasraḥ pratipadaḥ?

pli: Dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā, sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
skt: Asti bhikṣavo duḥkhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā | asti duḥkhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā | asti sukhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā | asti sukhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā ||

pli: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā?
skt: Tatra katamā duḥkhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā?

pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyāpi tibbarāgajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṃ rāgajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. Pakatiyāpi tibbadosajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṃ dosajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. Pakatiyāpi tibbamohajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṃ mohajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
skt: Ihaikatyaḥ pudgalaḥ prakṛtyaiva tīvra-rāgo bhavati | tīvra-dveṣo bhavati, tīvra-moho bhavati | so ’bhīkṣṇaṁ tīvra-rāgatayā rāgajaṁ duḥkha-daurmanasyaṁ pratisaṁvedayati | abhīkṣṇaṁ tīvra-dveṣatayā dveṣajaṁ duḥkha-daurmanasyaṁ pratisaṁvedayati | abhīkṣṇaṁ tīvra-mohatayā mohajaṁ duḥkha-daurmanasyaṁ pratisaṁvedayati ||

pli: Tassimāni pañcindriyāni mudūni pātubhavanti—
skt: Tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇīndriyāṇi dhandhāni bhavanti |

pli: saddhindriyaṃ, vīriyindriyaṃ, satindriyaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ, paññindriyaṃ.
skt: Śraddhendriyaṁ | vīryendriyaṁ | smṛtīndriyaṁ | samādhīndriyaṁ | prajñendriyam ||

pli: So imesaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ muduttā dandhaṃ ānantariyaṃ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṃ khayāya.
skt: Sa evaṁ pañcānāṁ lokottarāṇam-indriyāṇāṁ mṛdutvād-aśīghra-vāhitvāc-ca dhandham evānantaryaṁ samādhiṁ spṛśati | yad-utāsravāṇāṁ kṣayāya ||

pli: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā.
skt: Iyaṁ duḥkhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā ||

pli: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā?
skt: Tatra katamā duḥkhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā?

pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyāpi tibbarāgajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṃ rāgajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. Pakatiyāpi tibbadosajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṃ dosajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. Pakatiyāpi tibbamohajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṃ mohajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.

pli: Tassimāni pañcindriyāni adhimattāni pātubhavanti—
skt: Tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇīndriyāṇi adhimātrāṇi bhavanti |

pli: saddhindriyaṃ, vīriyindriyaṃ, satindriyaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ, paññindriyaṃ.
skt: Śraddhendriyaṁ | vīryendriyaṁ | smṛtīndriyaṁ | samādhīndriyaṁ | prajñendriyam ||

pli: So imesaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ adhimattattā khippaṃ ānantariyaṃ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṃ khayāya.
skt: Sa eṣāṁ pañcānāṁ lokottarāṇām-indriyāṇām-adhimātratvāt (tīkṣṇatvāt) śīghra-vāhitvāc-ca kṣipram evānantaryaṁ samādhiṁ spṛśati | yad-utāsravāṇāṁ kṣayāya ||

pli: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
skt: Iyaṁ duḥkhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā ||

pli: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā?
skt: Tatra katamā sukhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā?

pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyāpi na tibbarāgajātiko hoti, nābhikkhaṇaṃ rāgajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. pli: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā.
skt: Iyaṁ sukhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā ||

skt: Tatra katamā sukhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā?

Pakatiyāpi na tibbadosajātiko hoti, nābhikkhaṇaṃ dosajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. Pakatiyāpi na tibbamohajātiko hoti, nābhikkhaṇaṃ mohajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.

skt: Tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇīndriyāṇi adhimātrāṇi bhavanti |

skt: Śraddhendriyaṁ | vīryendriyaṁ | smṛtīndriyaṁ | samādhīndriyaṁ | prajñendriyam ||

pli: So imesaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ adhimattattā khippaṃ ānantariyaṃ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṃ khayāya.
skt: Sa eṣāṁ pañcānāṁ lokottarāṇām-indriyāṇāṁ-adhimātratvāt tīkṣṇatvāt śīghra-vāhitvāc-ca kṣipram evānantaryaṁ samādhiṁ spṛśati | yad-utāsravāṇāṁ kṣayāya ||

skt: Iyam-ucyate sukhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā ||

pli: Imā kho, bhikkhave, catasso paṭipadā”ti.
skt: Imā bhikṣavaḥ catasraḥ pratipadaḥ ||

pli: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
skt: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate ||

pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya
skt: ihānanda bhikṣur āgacchet sa evaṃ vadet ||

pli: ‘sammukhā metaṃ, āvuso, bhagavato sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ—ayaṃ dhammo, ayaṃ vinayo, idaṃ satthusāsanan’ti.
skt: saṃmukhaṃ me bhagavato ’ntikāc chrutaṃ saṃmukham udgṛhītam ayaṃ dharmo ’yaṃ vinaya idaṃ śāstuḥ śāsanam ||

pli: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhāsitaṃ neva abhinanditabbaṃ nappaṭikkositabbaṃ.
skt: tasya bhikṣavas tan notsāhayitavyaṃ nāvasādayitavyam ||

pli: Anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā tāni padabyañjanāni sādhukaṃ uggahetvā sutte otāretabbāni, vinaye sandassetabbāni.
skt: anutsāhayitvānavasādayitvā śrotram avadhāya tāni padavyaṃjanāny udgṛhya sūtre ’vatārayitavyaṃ vinaye saṃdarśayitavyaṃ ||

pli: Tāni ce sutte otāriyamānāni vinaye sandassiyamānāni na ceva sutte otaranti na vinaye sandissanti
skt: yadi sūtre ’vatāryamāṇā vinaye saṃdarśyamānāḥ sūtre nāvataranti vinaye na saṃdṛśyante ||

pli: ‘sammukhā metaṃ, āvuso, bhagavato sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ—ayaṃ dhammo, ayaṃ vinayo, idaṃ satthusāsanan’ti.
skt: saṃmukhaṃ me tasya mahato bhikṣusaṃghasyāntikāc chrutaṃ saṃmukham udgṛhītam ayaṃ dharmo ’yaṃ vinaya idaṃ śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ ||

skt: tasya bhikṣavas tan notsāhayitavyaṃ nāvasādayitavyam ||

skt: yadi sūtre ’vatāryamāṇā vinaye saṃdarśyamānāḥ sūtre nāvataranti vinaye na saṃdṛśyante ||

skt: saṃmukhaṃ me teṣāṃ saṃbahulānāṃ bhikṣūṇām antikāc chrutaṃ saṃmukham udgṛhītam ayaṃ dharmo ’yaṃ vinaya idaṃ śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ

pli: “Catasso imā, bhikkhave, samādhibhāvanā.
skt: Tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamāś-catastraḥ samādhi-bhāvanāḥ?

pli: Atthi, bhikkhave, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṃvattati;
skt: Asti bhikṣavaḥ samādhi-bhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā | dṛṣṭi-dharma-sukha-vihārāya saṁvartate ||

pli: atthi, bhikkhave, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ñāṇadassanappaṭilābhāya saṃvattati;
skt: Asti bhikṣavaḥ samādhi-bhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā | jñāna-darśana-pratilambhāya saṁvartate ||

pli: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṃvattati?
skt: Tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamā samādhi-bhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭa-dharma-sukha-vihārāya saṁvartate?

pli: bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā
skt: bhikṣur-aranya-gato vā, vṛkṣa-mūla-gato vā, śūnyāgāra-gato vā |

pli: Ayaṃ, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṃvattati.
skt: Iyaṁ samādhi-bhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭa-dharma-sukha-vihārāya saṁvartate ||

pli: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ñāṇadassanappaṭilābhāya saṃvattati?
skt: Tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamā samādhi-bhāvanā āsevitā | bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñāna-darśana-pratilambhāya saṁvartate?

pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ālokasaññaṃ manasi karoti, divāsaññaṃ adhiṭṭhāti—
skt: Iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā ālokasaṁjñā sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca sugṛhītā bhavati |

pli: yathā divā tathā rattiṃ, yathā rattiṃ tathā divā.
skt: yathā divā tathā rātrau, yathā rātrau tathā divā;  ||

pli: Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.
skt: Iti vivṛtena cetasā ’paryavanaddhena | divasa-saṁjñādhiṣṭhitena samaprabhāsaṁ cittaṁ bhāvayati ||

pli: Ayaṃ, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ñāṇadassanappaṭilābhāya saṃvattati.
skt: Iyaṁ samādhi-bhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñāna-darśana-pratilambhāya saṁvartate ||

pli: Imā kho, bhikkhave, catasso samādhibhāvanā.
skt: Imāś-catasraḥ samādhi-bhāvanāḥ ||

pli: Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, balāni.
skt: Tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamāni pañca balāni?

pli: Saddhābalaṃ,
skt: Śraddhā-balam |

pli: vīriyabalaṃ,
skt: vīrya-balam |

pli: satibalaṃ,
skt: smṛti-balam |

pli: samādhibalaṃ,
skt: samādhi-balam |

pli: paññābalaṃ
skt: prajñā-balam ||

pli: imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca balānī”ti.
skt: Imāni bhikṣavaḥ pañca balāni ||

pli: bodhisattasseva sato pañca mahāsupinā pāturahesuṃ
skt: bodhisatvo pi paṃca mahāsupināṃ paśyati |

pli: Katame pañca?
skt: katamāni paṃca ||

pli: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa sato ayaṃ mahāpathavī mahāsayanaṃ ahosi
skt: tathāgatasya bhikṣavaḥ pūrve sambodhim anabhisaṃbuddhasya iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī uccaśayanamahāśayanam abhūṣi |

skt: tathāgatasya bhikṣavaḥ pūrve saṃbodhim anabhisaṃbuddhasya catvāri nānāvarṇāṃ anekavarṇā ca caturhi diśāhi vaihāyasaṃ gatvā tathāgatasya pādatalāni upajighritvā sarvaśvetā apavidhyinsuḥ |

pli: tathāgato pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddho samāno mahato mīḷhapabbatassa uparūpari caṅkamati alippamāno mīḷhena.
skt: tathāgato bhikṣavaḥ pūrve saṃbodhim anabhisaṃbuddho mahato mīḍhaparvatasya uparim anupalipyamāno caṃkramaṃ caṃkrame |

pli: Mā, bhikkhave, puññānaṃ bhāyittha.
skt: mā yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ puṇyebhyo bhaiṣṭa |

pli: Sukhassetaṃ, adhivacanaṃ yadidaṃ puññāni.
skt: sukhasyaitad adhivacanam yaduta puṇyānīti |

pli: Abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, dīgharattaṃ katānaṃ puññānaṃ dīgharattaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ vipākaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ.
skt: abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhikṣavo dīrgarātrakṛtānāṃ puṇyānāṃ dīrgharātram iṣtaṃ priyaṃ manaāpaṃ vipākaṃ pratyanubhavituṃ |

pli: Satta vassāni mettacittaṃ bhāvesiṃ. satta saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe nayimaṃ lokaṃ punāgamāsiṃ.
skt: saptāhaṃ varṣāṇi maitraṃ cittaṃ bhāvayitvā sapta saṃvartavivartakalpān nemaṃ lokam upāgamam |

pli: Tatra sudaṃ, brahmā homi mahābrahmā abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī.
skt: tatrāhaṃ brahmā mahābrahmā abhibhūr anabhibhūto ’nyataradaśaśatavaśavartī

pli: Tassa mayhaṃ, imāni satta ratanāni cakkaratanaṃ, hatthiratanaṃ, assaratanaṃ, maṇiratanaṃ, itthiratanaṃ, gahapatiratanaṃ, pariṇāyakaratanameva sattamaṃ.
skt: tasya mama imāny sapta ratnāni cakraratnaṃ hastiratnam aśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam eva saptamaṃ

pli: Parosahassaṃ kho pana me, puttā ahesuṃ sūrā vīraṅgarūpā parasenappamaddanā.
skt: pūrṇaṃ ca me ’bhūt sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānāṃ |

pli: So imaṃ pathaviṃ sāgarapariyantaṃ adaṇḍena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhāvasinti.
skt: so ’ham imām eva samudraparyantāṃ adaṇḍenāśastreṇa dharmeṇa samenābhinirjityādhyavasitavān |

pli: Passa puññānaṃ vipākaṃ, Kusalānaṃ sukhesino;
skt: vipākaṃ paśya puṇyānāṃ kuśalānāṃ sukhaiṣiṇāṃ |

pli: Mettaṃ cittaṃ vibhāvetvā,Satta vassāni bhikkhavo;
skt: maitraṃ cittaṃ bhāvayitvā sapta varṣāṇi bhikṣavaḥ ||

pli: Sattasaṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe, Nayimaṃ lokaṃ punāgamiṃ.
skt: sapta saṃvartavaivartān nemaṃ lokam upāgamam |

pli: Saṃvaṭṭamāne lokamhi, homi ābhassarūpago;
skt: upagamat saṃvartamāne loke ’smin bhavāmy ābhāsvaropagaḥ ||

pli: Vivaṭṭamāne lokasmiṃ, suññabrahmūpago ahuṃ.
skt: vivartamāne ca bhavāmy eṣa brahmopago hy ahaṃ |

pli: Sattakkhattuṃ mahābrahmā, vasavattī tadā ahuṃ;
skt: saptakṛtvo mahābrahmā vaśavarty abhavat purā ||

pli: Chattiṃsakkhattuṃ devindo, devarajjamakārayiṃ.

pli: Muddhāvasitto khattiyo, manussādhipatī ahuṃ.

pli: Adaṇḍena asatthena, vijeyya pathaviṃ imaṃ;
skt: adaṇḍenāśastreṇa vijitya pṛthivīm imāṃ ||

pli: Asāhasena kammena, samena manusāsi taṃ.
skt: asāhasena dharmeṇa samyag evānuśiṣṭavān |

pli: Dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā, asmiṃ pathavimaṇḍale;
skt: dharmacakraṃ vartayitvā asmin pṛthivīmaṇḍale ||

pli: Mahaddhane mahābhoge, aḍḍhe ajāyihaṃ kule.

pli: Sabbakāmehi sampanne, ratanehi ca sattahi;

pli: Eso hetu mahantassa, pathabyo me na vipajjati;

pli: Buddhā saṅgāhakā loke, tehi etaṃ sudesitaṃ.

pli: Tasmā hi attakāmena, mahattamabhikaṅkhatā;

pli: Saddhammo garukātabbo, saraṃ buddhānasāsanan”ti.

pli: Saṃvaṭṭamāne sudāhaṃ, loke ābhassarūpago homi, vivaṭṭamāne loke suññaṃ brahmavimānaṃ upapajjāmi.
skt: saṃvartamāne ’haṃ loke ābhāsvare devanikāye upapadye | vivartamāne loke śūnye brāhme vimāne upapadye |

skt: Iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ viviktaṁ kāmaiḥ | viviktaṁ pāpakair-akuśalair-dharmaiḥ | savitarkaṁ savicāraṁ, vivekajaṁ prīti-sukhaṁ | prathamaṁ dhyānam-upasaṁpadya viharati ||

pli: Vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
skt: Sa vitarka-vicārāṇāṁ vyupaśamād | adhyātma-saṁprasādāc-cetasa ekotī-bhāvād | avitarkam-avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ prīti-sukhaṁ | dvitīyaṁ dhyānam-upasaṁpadya viharati ||

pli: Pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno, sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti, yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.

skt: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anu-varṣam upasthāpayet pācattikam ||

pli: yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā yānena yāyeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
skt: yā puna bhikṣuṇī a-gilānā yānam abhiruhet pācattikaṁ |

pli: yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
skt: yā puna bhikṣuṇī a-gilānā bhikṣuṇīya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṁ ||

pli: yā pana bhikkhunī sikkhamānāya ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
skt: yā puna bhikṣuṇī a-gilānā śikṣamāṇāya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṁ ||

pli: yā pana bhikkhunī sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
skt: yā puna bhikṣuṇī a-gilānā śrāmaṇerīya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṁ ||

pli: yā pana bhikkhunī gihiniyā ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
skt: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā gṛhiṇīya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṁ ||

pli: yā pana bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa, adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ āmasanaṃ vā parāmasanaṃ vā sādiyeyya, ayampi pārājikā hoti asaṃvāsā ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalikā.
skt: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya adho kakṣā bhyām upari jānu-maṇḍalābhyām āmoṣaṇa-parāmoṣaṇaṁ sādiyeya iyaṁ pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsyā |

pli: yā pana bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaraṃ appaṭikāraṃ akatasahāyaṃ tamanuvatteyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā:
skt: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṁ samagreṇa saṁghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptam apratikṛtam anuvarteya sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīya |

pli: “eso kho, ayye, bhikkhu samaggena saṅghena ukkhitto, dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaro appaṭikāro akatasahāyo, māyye, etaṃ bhikkhuṃ anuvattī”ti,
skt: eṣo hi ārye bhikṣuḥ samagreṇa saṁghena dharmato vinayato utkṣipto apratikṛto | mā etaṁ bhikṣum anuvarteya |

pli: evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya, yāvatatiyaṃ ce samanubhāsiyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyya,
skt: evaṁ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā taṁ vastuṁ pratigṛhṇeya | na pratiniḥsareya sā bhikṣunī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvat tṛtīyakam samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya |

pli: iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi pārājikā hoti asaṃvāsā ukkhittānuvattikā.
skt: ity etaṁ kuśalaṁ | no ca pratiniḥsar e ya iyam pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsyā |

pli: saṅketaṃ vā gaccheyya, kāyaṃ vā tadatthāya, ayampi pārājikā hoti asaṃvāsā aṭṭhavatthukā.
skt: kāyam vā anuprayaccheya | saṁketa-kṛtam vā gaccheya | iyam pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsya |

pli: yā pana bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthaggahaṇaṃ vā sādiyeyya
skt: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya anto hasta-grahaṇam vā sādīyeya |

pli: ‘buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṃ paccācikkhāmi, saṅghaṃ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṃ paccācikkhāmi,
skt: mā ārye śikṣā-pratyākhyāyikā bhohi | mā dharma-pratyākhyāyikā bhohi | mā saṁghapratyākhyāyikā bhohi | mā śikṣāṁ pratyākhyāhi |

pli: “buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmi dhammaṃ paccācikkhāmi, saṅghaṃ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṃ paccācikkhāmi,
skt: buddhaṁ pratyākhyāmi dharmaṁ pratyākhyāmi | saṁghaṁ pratyākhyāmi | śikṣāṁ pratyākhyāmi |

pli: yā pana bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuniṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṃ, anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṃ osāreyya, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
skt: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānan ti bhikṣuṇīṁ samagreṇa saṁghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptāṁ a-pratikṛtāṁ a-kṛtāṁ akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṁ an-avalokayitvā bhikṣuṇī- saṁghaṁ svayam eva pratyosārayati | ayam api dharmo prathamāpattiko saṁghātiśeṣo ||

pli: yā pana bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṃ vā, bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
skt: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya pātram cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glāna-bhaiṣajyam vā pratigṛhṇeya ayam api dharmo prathamāpattiko |

pli: tūlonaddhayo pana bhikkhu mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā tūlonaddhaṃ kārāpeyya, uddālanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
skt: yaḥ punar bhikṣus tūlasaṃstṛtaṃ pīṭhaṃ vā mañcaṃ avanahed avanāhayed vā uddalanāt pāyantikā |

pli: na kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
skt: na kāyapracālakā antargṛhe niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā

pli: na bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
skt: na bāhupracālakā antargṛhe niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā

pli: na sīsappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
skt: na śīrṣapracālakā antargṛhe niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā

pli: suppaṭicchannasuppaṭicchanno antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
skt: supraticchannā antargṛhaṃ pravekṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā

pli: ssamatittikasamatittikaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggahessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
skt: samatittikaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā

pli: sakkaccabhuñjanasakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
skt: satkṛtya piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā |

pli: sapadānasapadānaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
skt: sāvadānaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā

pli: suppaṭicchanno antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
skt: supraticchannā antargṛhe niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā

pli: ālopaparimaṇḍalaṃ ālopaṃ karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
skt: parimaṇḍalam ālopaṃ kariṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā

pli: sayanana sayanagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
skt: na niṣaṇṇā nipannasyāglānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā

pli: Agamā rājagahaṃ buddho, magadhānaṃ giribbajaṃ;
skt: gatvā ca so rājagṛhaṃ māgadhānāṃ girigahvare |

pli: Piṇḍāya abhihāresi, ākiṇṇavaralakkhaṇo.
skt: piṇḍāye abhisaresi ākīrṇavaralakṣaṇaḥ ||

pli: Imaṃ bhonto nisāmetha, abhirūpo brahā suci;
skt: imaṃ bhavanto paśyantu ākīrṇavaralakṣaṇaṃ |

pli: Caraṇena ca sampanno, yugamattañca pekkhati.
skt: āroheṇa ca sampannaṃ yugamātraṃ ca prekṣati ||

pli: Okkhittacakkhu satimā, nāyaṃ nīcakulāmiva;
skt: utkṣiptacakṣur medhāvī nāyam ūnakulodito |

pli: Rājadūtābhidhāvantu, kuhiṃ bhikkhu gamissati.
skt: rājadūtānubandhantu kahiṃ vāsam upeṣyati ||

pli: piṭṭhito anubandhisuṃ;
skt: pṛṣṭhato anubandhiṣu |

pli: Piṇḍacāraṃ caritvāna, Nikkhamma nagarā muni;
skt: piṇḍāye cāraṃ caritvāna niṣkramye nagarān muniḥ |

pli: Paṇḍavaṃ abhihāresi, Ettha vāso bhavissati.
skt: pāṇḍavaṃ abhisaresi atra vāso bhaviṣyati ||

pli: Disvāna vāsūpagataṃ, Tayo dūtā upāvisuṃ;
skt: jñātvā ca bāsopagataṃ eko dūto upāviśat |

pli: Tesu ekova āgantvā, Rājino paṭivedayi.
skt: aparo kṣipram āgamya rājño ārocaye tadā ||

pli: Esa bhikkhu mahārāja, Paṇḍavassa puratthato;
skt: eṣa bhikṣuḥ mahārāja pāṇḍavasmiṃ puras tataḥ |

pli: Nisinno byagghusabhova, Sīhova girigabbhare.
skt: niṣaṇṇo vṛkṣamūlasmiṃ ekāgro susamāhitaḥ ||

pli: Yānā oruyha khattiyo; Pattiko upasaṅkamma,
skt: yānāto otaritvāna padasā upasaṃkrame |

pli: Dadāmi bhoge bhuñjassu, Jātiṃ akkhāhi pucchito.
skt: dadāmi bhogāṃ bhuṃjāhi jātīṃ cākhyāhi pṛcchito |

pli: Ujuṃ janapado rāja, Himavantassa passato;
skt: nijajanapado rāja himavantasya pārśvataḥ |

pli: Dhanaviriyena sampanno, Kosalesu niketino.
skt: dhanavīryeṇa sampanno kośaleṣu nivāsito |

pli: Ādiccā nāma gottena, Sākiyā nāma jātiyā;
skt: ādityo nāma gotreṇa śākiyo nāma jātiye ||

pli: Tamhā kulā pabbajitomhi, Na kāme abhipatthayaṃ.
skt: tato kulā pravrajito haṃ na kāmāṃ abhiprārthaye |

pli: Taṇhāyogena saṃyuttā, rattacittā bhavābhave; Te yogayuttā mārassa, ayogakkhemino janā; jātīmaraṇagāmino
skt: tṛṣṇayā grathitāḥ satvā raktacittā bhavābhave । te yogayukta māreṇa hy ayogakṣemiṇo janāḥ । jarāmaraṇam āyānti yogā hi duratikramāḥ ।।

pli: Ye ca taṇhaṃ pahantvāna, vītataṇhā bhavābhave
skt: yas tu tṛṣṇāṁ prahāyeha vītatṛṣṇo bhavābhave

pli: cakkhunā saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu sotena saṃvaro; ghānena saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu jivhāya saṃvaro.
skt: cakṣuṣā saṃvaro sādhu sādhu śrotreṇa saṃvaraḥ | ghrāṇena saṃvaro sādhu sādhu jihvāya saṃvaro

pli: Saddhāya tarati oghaṃ, appamādena aṇṇavaṃ; Vīriyena dukkhamacceti, paññāya parisujjhati
skt: śraddhayā tarati hy ogham apramādena cārṇavaṃ vīryeṇa duḥkhaṃ tyajati prajñayā pariśudhyati

pli: Kathaṃ su tarati oghaṃ, kathaṃ su tarati aṇṇavaṃ; Kathaṃ su dukkhamacceti, kathaṃ su parisujjhati”.
skt: kena svid oghaṃ tarati kenottarati cārṇavaṃ duḥkhaṃ tyajati kena svit kena svit pariśudhyati

pli: Yo dukkhamaddakkhi yatonidānaṃ, Kāmesu so jantu kathaṃ nameyya; Upadhiṃ viditvā saṅgoti loke, Tasseva jantu vinayāya sikkhe”ti
skt: duḥkaṁ hi yo veda yato nidānaṁ kāmeṣu jantu sa kathaṁ rameta । upadhiṁ hi loke śalyam iti matvā tasyaiva dhīro vinayāya śikṣet ।।

pli: Sele yathā pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhito, Yathāpi passe janataṃ samantato; Tathūpamaṃ dhammamayaṃ sumedho, Pāsādamāruyha samantacakkhu; Sokāvatiṇṇaṃ janatamapetasoko, Avekkhati jātijarābhibhūtan”ti
skt: śaile yathā parvatamūrdhani sthito yathaiva paśyej janatāṁ samantāt । tathā hy asau dharmamayaṁ sumedhāḥ prāsādam āruhya samantacakṣuḥ । śokābhibhūtāṁ janatām aśoko 'drākṣīd imāṁ jātijarābhibhūtām ।।

pli: Uṭṭhehi vīra vijitasaṅgāma, Satthavāha anaṇa vicara loke; Desassu bhagavā dhammaṃ, Aññātāro bhavissantī”ti.
skt: utthehi vijitasaṃgrāma pūrṇabharo tvaṃ anṛṇa vicara loke | deśehi sugata dharmaṃ ājñātāro bhaviṣyanti

pli: Nayanti ve mahāvīrā, saddhammena tathāgatā; Dhammena nayamānānaṃ, kā usūyā vijānatan”ti
skt: nadantīha mahāvīrāḥ saddharmeṇa tathāgatāḥ । dharmeṇa nadamānānāṁ ke tv asūyed vijānakāḥ ।।

pli: Sukho viveko tuṭṭhassa, sutadhammassa passato; Abyāpajjaṃ sukhaṃ loke, pāṇabhūtesu saṃyamo.
skt: sukho vivekas tuṣṭasya śrutadharmasya paśyataḥ । avyāvadhyaḥ sukhaṁ loke prāṇabhūteṣu saṁyamaḥ ।।

pli: Sukhā virāgatā loke, kāmānaṃ samatikkamo; Asmimānassa yo vinayo, etaṃ ve paramaṃ sukhan”ti
skt: sukhaṁ virāgatā loke kāmānāṁ samatikramaḥ ।asmimānasya vinaya etad vai paramaṁ sukham ।।

pli: Ayoghanahatasseva, jalato jātavedaso ; Anupubbūpasantassa, yathā na ñāyate gati
skt: ayoghanahatasyaiva jvalato jātavedasaḥ । anupūrvopaśāntasya yathā na jñāyate gatiḥ ।।

pli: Evaṃ sammāvimuttānaṃ, kāmabandhoghatārinaṃ; Paññāpetuṃ gati natthi, pattānaṃ acalaṃ sukhan”ti
skt: evaṁ samyagvimuktānāṁ kāmapaṅkaughatāriṇām । prajñāpayituṁ gatir nāsti prāptānām acalaṁ sukham ।।

pli: Yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā, Ātāpino jhāyato brāhmaṇassa; Athassa kaṅkhā vapayanti sabbā, Yato khayaṃ paccayānaṃ avedī”ti
skt: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya । athāsya kāṅkṣā vyapayānti sarvā yadā kṣayaṁ pratyayānām upaiti ।।

pli: Yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā, Ātāpino jhāyato brāhmaṇassa; Vidhūpayaṃ tiṭṭhati mārasenaṃ, Sūriyova obhāsayamantalikkhan”ti.
skt: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya । vidhūpayaṁs tiṣṭhati mārasainyaṁ buddho hi saṁyojanavipramukta iti ।।

pli: Adhicetaso appamajjato, Munino monapathesu sikkhato; Sokā na bhavanti tādino, Upasantassa sadā satīmato”ti.
skt: adhicetasi mā pramadyata pratataṁ maunapadeṣu śikṣata । śokā na bhavanti tāyino hy upaśāntasya sadā smṛtātmanaḥ ।।

pli: Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekasaṃyojanampi samanupassāmi yena saṃyojanena saṃyuttā sattā dīgharattaṃ sandhāvanti saṃsaranti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, taṇhāsaṃyojanaṃ.
skt: nāham ekadharmam api samanupaśyāmi yena samanvāgatāḥ satvā dīrgham adhvānaṃ sandhāvanti saṃsaranti yaduta tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanena |

pli: Taṇhāsaṃyojanena hi, bhikkhave, saṃyuttā sattā dīgharattaṃ sandhāvanti saṃsarantī”ti.
skt: tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanena samanvāgatāḥ satvā dīrgham adhvānaṃ sandhāvanti saṃsaranti |

pli: Taṇhādutiyo puriso, dīghamaddhāna saṃsaraṃ; Itthabhāvaññathābhāvaṃ, saṃsāraṃ nātivattati.
skt: tṛṣṇādvitīyaḥ puruṣaḥ sudīrghe ’dhvani saṃsaran | itthaṃbhāvānyathībhāvaṃ satvānām āgatiṃ gatiṃ ||

pli: Apārutā tesaṃ amatassa dvārā, Ye sotavanto pamuñcantu saddhaṃ; Vihiṃsasaññī paguṇaṃ na bhāsiṃ, Dhammaṃ paṇītaṃ manujesu brahme’ti.
skt: apāvṛtaṃ me amṛtasya dvāraṃ brahmeti bhagavantaṃ ye śrotukāmā śraddhāṃ pramuṃcantu viheṭhasaṃjñāṃ | viheṭhasaṃjño praguṇo abhūṣi dharmo aśuddho magadheṣu pūrvaṃ ||

pli: Yassete caturo dhammā, vānarinda yathā tava; Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, diṭṭhaṃ so ativattati.
skt: yasyeme caturo dharmā vānarendra yathā tava | vīryaṃ buddhiṃ smṛtiḥ prajñā so duḥkham apavartati ||

pli: Pāturahosi magadhesu pubbe, Dhammo asuddho samalehi cintito; Apāpuretaṃ amatassa dvāraṃ, Suṇantu dhammaṃ vimalenānubuddhaṃ.
skt: prādurahosi samalehi cintito dharmo aśuddho magadheṣu pūrvaṃ | apāvṛtaṃ te amṛtasya dvāraṃ śṛṇontu dharmaṃ vimalānubuddhaṃ ||

pli: Mādisā ve jinā honti, ye pattā āsavakkhayaṃ; Jitā me pāpakā dhammā, tasmāhamupaka jino”ti.
skt: jinā hi mādṛśā jñeyā ye prāptā hy āsravakṣayam । jitā me pāpakā dharmās tato 'ham upagā jinaḥ ।।

pli: Āgato kho mahāsamaṇo, māgadhānaṃ giribbajaṃ; Sabbe  añcaye netvāna, kaṃsu dāni nayissatī”ti.
skt: āgato śramaṇo gautamo magadhānāṃ girivrajaṃ | (sarve saṃjaye) netvāna kaṃ su nāma nayiṣyati ||

pli: Aggihuttamukhā yaññā, sāvittī chandaso mukhaṃ; Rājā mukhaṃ manussānaṃ, nadīnaṃ sāgaro mukhaṃ.
skt: agnihotramukhā yajñā sāvitrī chandasāṃ mukhaṃ | rājā mukhaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ nadīnāṃ sāgaro mukhaṃ ||

pli: Nakkhattānaṃ mukhaṃ cando, ādicco tapataṃ
skt: nakṣatrāṇāṃ candro mukhaṃ   | ādityo tapasāṃ

pli: Ye dhammā hetuppabhavā, Tesaṃ hetuṃ tathāgato āha; Tesañca yo nirodho, Evaṃvādī mahāsamaṇo”ti.
skt: ye dharmā hetuprabhāvā hetun teṣāṃ tathāgato āha | teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ ||

pli: Yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā, Ātāpino jhāyato brāhmaṇassa; Athassa kaṅkhā vapayanti sabbā, Yato pajānāti sahetudhamman”ti.
skt: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya । athāsya kāṅkṣā vyapayānti sarvā yadā prajānāti sahetudharmam ।।

pli: Nagarampi nāgo bhasmaṃ kareyya, Tathā hi so balaviriyūpapanno; Dhammañca nāgo apacāyamāno, Tasmā parakkamma tapo karoti.
skt: nagaraṃ pi nāgo bhasmīkareyā tathā hi yāvac ca balopapeto ||  dharmaṃ tu nāgo ayaṃ yācamāno hastatvam āgacche vaṇīpakasya ||

pli: Ko sūdha tarati oghaṃ, Kodha tarati aṇṇavaṃ; Appatiṭṭhe anālambe, Ko gambhīre na sīdati
skt: ka etam oghaṃ tarati rātriṃdivam atandritaḥ anālambe ’pratiṣṭhe ca ko gaṃbhīre na sīdati

pli: Sabbadā sīlasampanno, Paññavā susamāhito; Ajjhattacintī satimā, Oghaṃ tarati duttaraṃ.
skt: sarvataḥ śīlasaṃpannaḥ prajñāvān susamāhitaḥ adhyātmacintī smṛtimāṃs taratīmaṃ sudustaraṃ

pli: Virato kāmasaññāya, Sabbasaṃyojanātigo; Nandībhavaparikkhīṇo, So gambhīre na sīdati
skt: viraktaḥ kāmasaṃjñābhyo rūpasaṃyojanātigaḥ anālambe ’pratiṣṭhe ca sa gaṃbhīre na sīdati

pli: Rāgo ca doso ca kutonidānā, Aratī ratī lomahaṃso kutojā; Kuto samuṭṭhāya manovitakkā, Kumārakā dhaṅkamivossajanti
skt: rāgadveṣau bhagavan kinnidānāv aratiratī romaharṣaḥ kuto ’yam kutaḥsamutthāś ca mano vitarkāḥ kumārakā dhātrīm ivāśrayante

pli: Snehajā attasambhūtā, Nigrodhasseva khandhajā; Puthū visattā kāmesu, Māluvāva vitatāvane.
skt: snehajā ātmasaṃbhūtā nyagrodhaskandhakā yathā pṛthagviṣaktāḥ kāmeṣu mālutā vā latā vane

pli: Rāgo ca doso ca itonidānā, Aratī ratī lomahaṃso itojā; Ito samuṭṭhāya manovitakkā, Kumārakā dhaṅkamivossajanti.
skt: rāgaś ca dveṣaś ca itonidānāv aratiratī romaharṣaḥ ito ’yaṃ itaḥsamutthāś ca mano vitarkāḥ kumārakā dhātrīm ivāśrayante

pli: Ye naṃ pajānanti yatonidānaṃ, Te naṃ vinodenti suṇohi yakkha; Te duttaraṃ oghamimaṃ taranti, Atiṇṇapubbaṃ apunabbhavāyā”ti.
skt: ye tān prajānanti yatonidānāṃs te tāṃ janā yakṣa vinodayanti ta arṇavaṃ saṃpratarantīhaugham atīrṇapūrvam apunarbhavāya

pli: Kathaṃ satassa carato, viññāṇaṃ uparujjhati;
skt: kathaṃ smṛtasya carato vijñānam uparudhyate

pli: Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, Vedanaṃ nābhinandato; Evaṃ satassa carato, Viññāṇaṃ uparujjhatī”ti.
skt: adhyātaṃ ca bahirdhā ca vedanāṃ nābhinandataḥ evaṃ smṛtasya carato vijñānam uparudhyate

pli: Kenassu nivuto loko, Kenassu nappakāsati; Kissābhilepanaṃ brūsi, Kiṃsu tassa mahabbhayaṃ
skt: kenāyaṃ nivṛto lokaḥ kenāyaṃ na prakāśate kiṃ cābhilepanaṃ brūṣe kiṃ ca tasya mahad bhayam

pli: Avijjāya nivuto loko, Vevicchā pamādā nappakāsati;  Jappābhilepanaṃ brūmi, Dukkhamassa mahabbhayaṃ
skt: avidyānivṛto lokaḥ pramādān na prakāśate jalpābhilepanaṃ brūmi duḥkhaṃ tasya mahad bhayaṃ

pli: Savanti sabbadhi sotā, Sotānaṃ kiṃ nivāraṇaṃ; Sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūhi, Kena sotā pidhiyyare.
skt: sravanti sarvataḥ srotāḥ srotasāṃ kiṃ nivāraṇaṃ srotasāṃ saṃvaraṃ brūhi kena srotaḥ pidhīyate

pli: Yāni sotāni lokasmiṃ, Sati tesaṃ nivāraṇaṃ; Sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmi, Paññāyete pidhiyyare.
skt: yāni srotāṃsi lokasya smṛtiḥ teṣāṃ nivāraṇaṃ srotasāṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmi prajñayā hi pidhīyate

pli: Paññā ceva  sati yañca Nāmarūpañca mārisa; Etaṃ me puṭṭho pabrūhi, Katthetaṃ uparujjhati.
skt: prajñāyāś ca smṛteś caiva nāmarūpasya sarvaśaḥ ācakṣva pṛṣṭa etan me kutraitad uparudhyate

pli: Yametaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi, ajita taṃ vadāmi te; Yattha nāmañca rūpañca, asesaṃ uparujjhati; Viññāṇassa nirodhena, etthetaṃ uparujjhati.
skt: prajñā caiva smṛtiś caiva nāmarūpaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ vijñānasya nirodhād dhi atraitad uparudhyate

pli: Ye ca saṅkhātadhammāse, ye ca sekhā puthū idha; Tesaṃ me nipako iriyaṃ, puṭṭho pabrūhi mārisa.
skt: ye ca saṃkhyātadharmāṇo ye ca śaikṣāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ teṣāṃ me nipakasyeryāṃ pṛṣṭaḥ prabrūhi mārṣa

pli: Kāmesu nābhigijjheyya, Manasānāvilo siyā; Kusalo sabbadhammānaṃ, Sato bhikkhu paribbaje”ti.
skt: kāmeṣu nābhigṛdhyeta manasānāvilo bhavet kuśalaḥ sarvadharmeṣu smṛto bhikṣuḥ parivrajet

pli: Aññathābhāvī bhavasatto loko, Bhavapareto bhavamevābhinandati;
skt: loko 'yam anyathābhūto bhavasakto bhave rataḥ । bhavābhinandī

pli: Upadhiñhi paṭicca dukkhamidaṃ sambhoti, sabbupādānakkhayā natthi dukkhassa sambhavo.
skt: pratītya duḥkham upadhiṁ bhavaty upadhisaṁbhavam । kṣayāt sarvopadhīnāṁ tu nāsti duḥkhasya saṁbhavaḥ ।।

pli: bhavā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammāti.
skt: anityā hi bhavāḥ sarve duḥkhā vipariṇāminaḥ ।

pli: Ayaṃ loko santāpajāto, Phassapareto rogaṃ vadati attato; Yena yena hi maññati, Tato taṃ hoti aññathā.
skt: tāpajāto hy ayaṁ lokaḥ skandhā nātmeti manyate । manyate yena yenāhaṁ tat tad bhavati cānyathā ।।
